UXSolutions.title: Our Tailored UX Solutions
UXSolutions.new_content: Complete new design from zero, just tell us what you need and we will work hard to make it real.
UXSolutions.redesign_content1: If you wan to give a more fresh look to your website or mobile application this is what you need.
UXSolutions.redesign_content2: We will make sure to give you a website that suits new tendances but still follows your brand identity
UXSolutions.followup_content1: Updates, improvements and changes of an already existing website or mobile application.
UXSolutions.followup_content2: You can ask for a specific change or subscripte to our plans to get your website always updated!

Apps.title: Apps, websites & more
Apps.content3: Software as a Service - Empowering Your Business

Subscriptions.title: Subscriptions plans
Subscriptions.std_description: Website follow-up. Get any update you want when you need.
Subscriptions.pro_description: Website follow-up + Any Graphics you need.
Subscriptions.perso_description: Personalize your plan based on your needs.
Subscriptions.included_description1: You get a team to work on your website full-time.
Subscriptions.included_description2: Get a website always updated and any graphics* you need.
Subscriptions.included_description3: You decide what you need and we do it. This plan can be cheaper or more expensive depending on your demands.
